item.title: Help me on this
item.dc:creator: @killer_numba_1 killer numba 1
item.description:
@killer_numba_1 wrote:

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
:: ::
:: HyperCompile ::
:: Made by Yarnova. ::
:: ::
::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

@echo off
:menu
title HyperCompile
cls
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo :: ::
echo :: HyperCompile ::
echo :: Made by Yarnova. ::
echo :: ::
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo.
echo.
echo compile - Compile server.
echo serverdown - Takes down the server.
echo run - Run the server.
echo restart - All of the above, in order.
echo exit - Exit HyperCompile.
echo.
echo.
set /p c=Access:
if %c%==compile goto compile
if %c%==run goto run
if %c%==serverdown goto serverdown
if %c%==exit goto exit
if %c%==restart goto restart
goto menu
:compile
cls
@echo off
title HyperCompile - Compile
“%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause
goto menu
:exit
cls
exit
:restart
cls
@echo off
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo :: ::
echo :: Compiling the server(…) ::
echo :: ::
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
title HyperCompile - Restart - Compile
“%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause
goto restart2
:restart2
cls
@echo off
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo :: ::
echo :: Compiling the server(Done) ::
echo :: Taking down the server(…) ::
echo :: ::
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
title HyperCompile - Restart - ServerDown
tskill java /a
pause
goto restart3
:restart3
cls
@echo off
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
echo :: ::
echo :: Compiling server(Done) ::
echo :: Taking down the server(Done) ::
echo :: -Running the server- ::
echo :: ::
echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
title RunServer
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause
goto exit
:serverdown
cls
@echo off
cls
title HyperCompile - ServerDown
tskill java /a
pause
goto menu
:run
cls
@echo off
title RunServer
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause
goto exit
